title: High CPU Alert on Database
description: Monitoring systems alert that the primary database server is experiencing sustained high CPU usage.

tasks.expected_outcome: Agent takes ownership of the alert.

tasks.description: Access the database monitoring tool to identify the queries consuming the most CPU.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds a single, inefficient query from a new reporting feature is causing the high load.

tasks.description: Escalate the issue to the engineering team responsible for the reporting feature, providing the problematic query.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a high-priority ticket with actionable data for the developers.
